TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ruisui, title = Ruisui, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruisui} }

S.FORM: Ruisui Ruisui a sakuwan ku Hualien. kumud nu kalesakan, 151.59 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 57.39 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 7.4 km²), u kasabinawlan, 9,520 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 3,717 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 4,438 ku ingcumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 47%(Pangcah, Sakizaya) ku kasabinawlan. u tademaw ilabu nu siyang u paylang ku alumanay. nikasakuwakuwan Ruisui mala 11 a cuwen atu 16 ku niyazu'. kina 16 a niyazu'sa, Langas , Lacihakan , Morocan , Atolan , Koyo , Ukang , Narowan , Kalala , Sapat , Maibul , Olalip , Fanaw , Olaw , Marorok , Cirocan , Kiwit . 瑞穗鄉(阿美語:Kohkoh；撒奇萊雅語:Kuhkuh；臺灣客家語海陸腔:suiˇ suiˇ hiongˋ) . Ruisui/Kuhkuh Amis a kamu Kohkoh han, Sakizaya a kamu Kuhkuh han, Taywan a Ngayngay a kamu hay-lu a ngiha nu suiˇ suiˇ hiongˋ, tini i Taywan Hualien akuwan tepanay pasatimulan, nuamisan belaw u Bataan, nusatipan belaw u Wan-zung akuwan, Zuo-si akuwan, nuwalian belaw nu Bakung a kenis, nutinulan mitules tu Pusuku, izaw ku amislic micaluway tuniyan a kenis. tunian a binawln izaw ku Layak, Ngayngay atu Taywan a binacadan angangan, i Taywan u Amis ku katuday a tademaw, zuma u Maibil a niyazu' u Sakizayaay u angangan ku binacadan, i tiniay u Amis atu Ngayngay a kamu. :shuiˊmuiˋ ), Mizuo,改為音近之"瑞穗"(Mizuho). . Ruisui/Kuhkuh malumanay a ngangan "Suy-wey", Taywan a Ngayngay a kamu hay-lu a ngiha nu shuiˊmuiˋ, u imi u Siu-ku-luan xī a ikul, zikuzan u Lipun a tademawan zayhan a u 水尾 nu ngiha nu Lipun mazapi ku "Mizuo", pasumat han u Ruisui/Kuhkuh "Mizuho". hamin ku hekal izaw ku 135 pin-bang-kung-li, izaw ku utademaw pakala tu cacay mang cacay lasubu kuliwan a tademaw, malikid ku nanum nu Siw -ku luan a sauwac a balungaay ku katinengan. . Ruisui/Kuhkuh palecad izaw ku zuzang , ungsing, singanganay a uciy uyni u kapahay a saka izaw, mala u Kalinku mapilung tu aidangan a tu singanganay a kakitaizaan. hekal a lala' Ruisui/Kuhkuh i tini i Hua-tung sahelung a enal, nusatipan belaw u Cung-yan-san-may, nuwalian macapi tu Hay-an a buyu', nutimulan izaw ku lala' nu Wu-he-tay-ti, tepanay nu Siu-ku-luan a sauwac atu adidi'ay a sauwac kasayadah ku masabucuyay cebusay nu nanummasaupu a masacebal, masaenalay a lala', u angangan nu nipalumaan atu pahapay a maluk a kakitizaan. Wu-he namisacayay a buyu' , Kiwit u tusa izaw kutabakiay a buyu', tepanay u sauwac ku kalahini nu liwliw , Kiwit ku-ti mahaymaw ku masapilisay a zazan, yadah ku nipalumaan tu ucya atu heci nipalumaan ku kakikalisiw . lala' nu hekal Ruisui/Kuhkuh a kenis izaw ku se-wen a ba'tu malaklak maliwasak i i Da-ma-yan a buyu', Zun-ku-an a sauwac tusaay a ba'tu atu Hung-ye i papaw nu sauwac, hinaba'tu izaw ku ciaw-san-se-pian a ba'tu, langdaw lian-se-ciaw-san-se a ba'tu, sumilaway malikatay a ba'tu atu kayabes a ba'tu, bunacay a ba'tu malecad a izaw. u culil nu nanum Ruisui/Kuhkuh hamin nu kenis tungusay u Siu-ku-luan a sauwac u kalikitan nu nanum, Siu-ku-luan a sauwac kalikit makayza u nutimulan pasayza i nuwamisan, hamin nu kenis nutimulan a likit tayza i tini a kenis, masa u nu Pusku a kenis. sasangangangiw sa malikit ktukuh i ungay likelikenan miliyas tu keni micumut tu labu nu kenis, makay Kiwit a niyazu'an malikit i Duan-se a likelikenan haw sa, mala u saadidi'ay nu Fakung a lilis nu ladayan, likit tayza i Sing-zou a likelikenan paniyul pasanuwalian malikit micumut tu Fakung a kenis, pakala tu sepat a kung-li mamicumut tu bayu. Hong-ye a sauwac u Siu-ku-luan a tabakiay a sauwac, u angangan i tiza i Wan-zung a kenis Hu-tuw a buyu', malikit i Hun-ye muculil i tini a kenis, i tini i Wu-he-tay-ti atu uyzaay a kenis nu zunaay amapela', i tini tu Siw-san a sangaw nuwalian nutimulan i cacay kung-li micumut tu Siu-ku-luan a sauwac. Hu-yuan a sauwac kasumamadan a kamu u Ma-lan-kou a sauwac, u zuma sa u Ma-ce-low a sauwac, u Siu-ku-luan a sauwac nuzumaay tabakiay a adidi'ay a sauwac. uyniay u sauwac u angangan namakay i Wan-zung a kenis Lung-tay-uen a buyu' i tiza nutimulan, i tini i Hu-yuan nu buyu'ay aidangan namakay tapiingan maala tayni i tiniay a kenis, makayamis tatimul matusul ku hekal nu kenis, i tini i Ruy-mey a niyazu' nuwalian nutimulan cacay a kung-li micumut tu Siu-ku-luan a sauwac. demidad Ruisui/Kuhkuh a demiad tungusay u demiad akuti'ay a bali. kilul tuni nisulitan macapi ku Cung-yan-ci-sian-ci Sen-kung-ci-sian-ci tunisulitan tu nikingsaan, u nipaayaw Ruisui/Kuhkuh nisulitan tu nu demiad i tini i mahiniay i sasa, u kasa'timan amiazih, anumahiza palalecad tu akuti' mahiza u nu Singku a kenis,nika zayhan uyni kakitizaan i Kalinku a helung, cacay ka lecad ku caledes nu demiad mahapinang kacadedes ku Kalingku a dadipasan atu Singku a kenis. laylay Ruisui/Kuhkuh a kenis kasumamadan i tini tuku tademaw mauzip, uyza tu kasumamadan nisubelidan u Sawba a ba'tu, kilul tu nisulitan tuni micekiway tu kasumamadan tu nisubelidan a tuud, uyni nisubelidan a tuud tungusay nu ba'tuay aziday laled katukuh ayza pakalatu tulu a malebut katanaya nu mihcaan, u angangan a lalangawan mahiza nu Puyuma a lalangawan atu Cilin a lalangawan. i kasumamadan tu 19 a mihcaan i sazikuzay ayaw nu padadas nu Layak, tini u kanalelan nu Yun-cu-min, u angangan sa u Amis, kilul tu nisulitan kuni nakamuan tu laylay, u saayaway u Kiwit a niyazuan, Mo-lu-zang, Lan-a-san, A-du-lan, U-ya-li, Cin-san, U-law, Ciya-nana yunian kasaniyazu'. kalisiw u nipahapayay tu aadupan u nikalukan kunilaculan nu Ruisui/Kuhkuh knis, u misakakawaw a tademaw hami nu kenis u malukay tulu izaw ku cacay, u sakalukan izaw nu umahay ku tukus u buyu'ay, hamin nu kanatal izaway ku sapananum nu umahay a tukus, izaw kuni patizeng tu kayku, kuhkuh, ciyak, pahabay tu katalalan u singmuen nu pahapayay a kakitizaan, u nikalukan nipalumaan uyza u tebus u mami u palingat ucya atu kuwa a nipaluma'an. u piidangan pihipangan Hungye a unsing tini i Ruisui/Kuhkuh satipan nu sazikuzay unsing a zazan, tungusay nu Wanzung a kenis, u akuti' 50 tu, u nanum u tingalaway a nanum Tan-suan-cin a unsing, caay ka ngantul, maapi ku unsing nu Ruisui/Kuhkuh a unsing, u Wanzungay hamin a kenis, u akuti' 45 tu, tungusay u Zan-sing-tan a unsing, kalawlawan ku nanum, u kanamuhan nu binawlan u tamelacay a kakitizaan nu unsing.

Roisoi Roisoi a sakowan ko Hoalien. komod no kalesakan, 151.59 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 57.39 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 7.4 km²), o kasabinawlan, 9,520 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 3,717 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 4,438 ko ingcomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, Pakalato 47%(Pangcah, Sakizaya) ko kasabinawlan. o tademaw ilabo no siyang o paylang ko alomanay. nikasakowakowan Roisoi mala 11 a cowen ato 16 ko niyazo'. kina 16 a niyazo'sa, Langas , Lacihakan , Morocan , Atolan , Koyo , Ukang , Narowan , Kalala , Sapat , Maibol , Olalip , Fanaw , Olaw , Marorok , Cirocan , Kiwit . 瑞穗鄉(阿美語:Kohkoh；撒奇萊雅語:Kohkoh；臺灣客家語海陸腔:soiˇ soiˇ hiongˋ) . Roisoi/Kohkoh Amis a kamo Kohkoh han, Sakizaya a kamo Kohkoh han, Taywan a Ngayngay a kamo hay-lo a ngiha no soiˇ soiˇ hiongˋ, tini i Taywan Hoalien akowan tepanay pasatimolan, noamisan belaw o Bataan, nosatipan belaw o Wan-zong akowan, Zoo-si akowan, nowalian belaw no Bakong a kenis, notinolan mitoles to Posoko, izaw ko amislic micaloway toniyan a kenis. tonian a binawln izaw ko Layak, Ngayngay ato Taywan a binacadan angangan, i Taywan o Amis ko katoday a tademaw, zoma o Maibil a niyazo' o Sakizayaay o angangan ko binacadan, i tiniay o Amis ato Ngayngay a kamo. :shoiˊmoiˋ ), Mizoo,改為音近之"瑞穗"(Mizoho). . Roisoi/Kohkoh malomanay a ngangan "Soy-wey", Taywan a Ngayngay a kamo hay-lo a ngiha no shoiˊmoiˋ, o imi o Sio-ko-loan xī a ikol, zikozan o Lipon a tademawan zayhan a o 水尾 no ngiha no Lipon mazapi ko "Mizoo", pasomat han o Roisoi/Kohkoh "Mizoho". hamin ko hekal izaw ko 135 pin-bang-kong-li, izaw ko otademaw pakala to cacay mang cacay lasobo koliwan a tademaw, malikid ko nanom no Siw -ko loan a saowac a balongaay ko katinengan. . Roisoi/Kohkoh palecad izaw ko zozang , ongsing, singanganay a ociy oyni o kapahay a saka izaw, mala o Kalinko mapilong to aidangan a to singanganay a kakitaizaan. hekal a lala' Roisoi/Kohkoh i tini i Hoa-tong sahelong a enal, nosatipan belaw o Cong-yan-san-may, nowalian macapi to Hay-an a boyo', notimolan izaw ko lala' no Wo-he-tay-ti, tepanay no Sio-ko-loan a saowac ato adidi'ay a saowac kasayadah ko masabocoyay cebosay no nanommasaopo a masacebal, masaenalay a lala', o angangan no nipalomaan ato pahapay a malok a kakitizaan. Wo-he namisacayay a boyo' , Kiwit o tosa izaw kotabakiay a boyo', tepanay o saowac ko kalahini no liwliw , Kiwit ko-ti mahaymaw ko masapilisay a zazan, yadah ko nipalomaan to ocya ato heci nipalomaan ko kakikalisiw . lala' no hekal Roisoi/Kohkoh a kenis izaw ko se-wen a ba'to malaklak maliwasak i i Da-ma-yan a boyo', Zon-ko-an a saowac tosaay a ba'to ato Hong-ye i papaw no saowac, hinaba'to izaw ko ciaw-san-se-pian a ba'to, langdaw lian-se-ciaw-san-se a ba'to, somilaway malikatay a ba'to ato kayabes a ba'to, bonacay a ba'to malecad a izaw. o colil no nanom Roisoi/Kohkoh hamin no kenis tongosay o Sio-ko-loan a saowac o kalikitan no nanom, Sio-ko-loan a saowac kalikit makayza o notimolan pasayza i nowamisan, hamin no kenis notimolan a likit tayza i tini a kenis, masa o no Posko a kenis. sasangangangiw sa malikit ktokoh i ongay likelikenan miliyas to keni micomot to labo no kenis, makay Kiwit a niyazo'an malikit i Doan-se a likelikenan haw sa, mala o saadidi'ay no Fakong a lilis no ladayan, likit tayza i Sing-zoo a likelikenan paniyol pasanowalian malikit micomot to Fakong a kenis, pakala to sepat a kong-li mamicomot to bayo. Hong-ye a saowac o Sio-ko-loan a tabakiay a saowac, o angangan i tiza i Wan-zong a kenis Ho-tow a boyo', malikit i Hon-ye mocolil i tini a kenis, i tini i Wo-he-tay-ti ato oyzaay a kenis no zonaay amapela', i tini to Siw-san a sangaw nowalian notimolan i cacay kong-li micomot to Sio-ko-loan a saowac. Ho-yoan a saowac kasomamadan a kamo o Ma-lan-koo a saowac, o zoma sa o Ma-ce-low a saowac, o Sio-ko-loan a saowac nozomaay tabakiay a adidi'ay a saowac. oyniay o saowac o angangan namakay i Wan-zong a kenis Long-tay-oen a boyo' i tiza notimolan, i tini i Ho-yoan no boyo'ay aidangan namakay tapiingan maala tayni i tiniay a kenis, makayamis tatimol matosol ko hekal no kenis, i tini i Roy-mey a niyazo' nowalian notimolan cacay a kong-li micomot to Sio-ko-loan a saowac. demidad Roisoi/Kohkoh a demiad tongosay o demiad akoti'ay a bali. kilol toni nisolitan macapi ko Cong-yan-ci-sian-ci Sen-kong-ci-sian-ci tonisolitan to nikingsaan, o nipaayaw Roisoi/Kohkoh nisolitan to no demiad i tini i mahiniay i sasa, o kasa'timan amiazih, anomahiza palalecad to akoti' mahiza o no Singko a kenis,nika zayhan oyni kakitizaan i Kalinko a helong, cacay ka lecad ko caledes no demiad mahapinang kacadedes ko Kalingko a dadipasan ato Singko a kenis. laylay Roisoi/Kohkoh a kenis kasomamadan i tini toko tademaw maozip, oyza to kasomamadan nisobelidan o Sawba a ba'to, kilol to nisolitan toni micekiway to kasomamadan to nisobelidan a tood, oyni nisobelidan a tood tongosay no ba'toay aziday laled katokoh ayza pakalato tolo a malebot katanaya no mihcaan, o angangan a lalangawan mahiza no Poyoma a lalangawan ato Cilin a lalangawan. i kasomamadan to 19 a mihcaan i sazikozay ayaw no padadas no Layak, tini o kanalelan no Yon-co-min, o angangan sa o Amis, kilol to nisolitan koni nakamoan to laylay, o saayaway o Kiwit a niyazoan, Mo-lo-zang, Lan-a-san, A-do-lan, U-ya-li, Cin-san, U-law, Ciya-nana yonian kasaniyazo'. kalisiw o nipahapayay to aadopan o nikalokan konilacolan no Roisoi/Kohkoh knis, o misakakawaw a tademaw hami no kenis o malokay tolo izaw ko cacay, o sakalokan izaw no omahay ko tokos o boyo'ay, hamin no kanatal izaway ko sapananom no omahay a tokos, izaw koni patizeng to kayko, kohkoh, ciyak, pahabay to katalalan o singmoen no pahapayay a kakitizaan, o nikalokan nipalomaan oyza o tebos o mami o palingat ocya ato kowa a nipaloma'an. o piidangan pihipangan Hongye a onsing tini i Roisoi/Kohkoh satipan no sazikozay onsing a zazan, tongosay no Wanzong a kenis, o akoti' 50 to, o nanom o tingalaway a nanom Tan-soan-cin a onsing, caay ka ngantol, maapi ko onsing no Roisoi/Kohkoh a onsing, o Wanzongay hamin a kenis, o akoti' 45 to, tongosay o Zan-sing-tan a onsing, kalawlawan ko nanom, o kanamohan no binawlan o tamelacay a kakitizaan no onsing.
